BBEX3.M.SVC.USD.CA.AB.A01: Exchange rates for the US dollar in El Salvador / USD 1 = SVC ... (selling)
General: With effect from 1 January 2001, the US dollar was introduced as legal tender alongside the El Salvador colón at the rate of USD 1 = SVC 8.75; see BBEX2:M:SVC:USD:CA:AC:A01.
Source: Dresdner Bank Lateinamerika AG, Hamburg (formerly: Deutsch-Südamerikanische Bank AG).
Comment on 1992-06: Exchange rate as of 26 June 1992.
Comment on 1994-03: Exchange rate as of 25 March 1994.
